00063   template<typename MatType>
00064   inline static void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00065                              arma::mat& W,
00066                              const arma::mat& H)
00067   {
00068     // The call to inv() sometimes fails; so we are using the psuedoinverse.
00069     // W = (inv(H * H.t()) * H * V.t()).t();
00070     W = V * H.t() * pinv(H * H.t());
00071 
00072     // Set all negative numbers to machine epsilon
00073     for (size_t i = 0; i < W.n_elem; i++)
00074     {
00075       if (W(i) < 0.0)
00076       {
00077         W(i) = 0.0;
00078       }
00079     }
00080   }
00081 
00094   template<typename MatType>
00095   inline static void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00096                              const arma::mat& W,
00097                              arma::mat& H)
00098   {
00099     H = pinv(W.t() * W) * W.t() * V;
00100 
00101     // Set all negative numbers to 0.
00102     for (size_t i = 0; i < H.n_elem; i++)
00103     {
00104       if (H(i) < 0.0)
00105       {
00106         H(i) = 0.0;
00107       }
00108     }
00109   }
00110 }; // class NMFALSUpdate
